name: The Chatters Show
description:
The Chatters Show is designed for Twitch streamers and their chats. Create questions sets and play with your chat to see who is the smartest person.

  • Create any question set you desire
  • Share and edit any question set with your community
  • Smooth connection to Twitch chat
  • Up to 4 different chats can play at the same time
  • Download dozen premade question sets from the get go
